00001 package newtonERP.orm.associations;
00002 
00003 import newtonERP.module.AbstractOrmEntity;
00004 import newtonERP.module.exception.TableAssociationException;
00005 import newtonERP.module.generalEntity.ListOfValue;
00006 
00012 public class ListOfValueManager
00013 {
00018         public static final void addListOfValue(AbstractOrmEntity entity,
00019                         AbstractOrmEntity foreignEntity)
00020         {
00021                 String foreignKeyName = foreignEntity.getForeignKeyName();
00022 
00023                 if (entity.getFields().getField(foreignKeyName) == null)
00024                         throw new TableAssociationException(foreignKeyName
00025                                         + " introuvable dans " + entity.getSystemName());
00026 
00027                 ListOfValue listOfValue = new ListOfValue(entity, foreignEntity
00028                                 .getNaturalKeyName(), foreignEntity);
00029 
00030                 entity.addPositiveListOfValue(foreignKeyName, listOfValue);
00031 
00032                 foreignEntity.addNegativeListOfValue(listOfValue);
00033         }
00034 }
